nodes.text: The D'kee-class planetary lander, also known as the D'kee-class landing ship, was used by the Ssi-ruuvi Imperium during its invasion of Bakura in 4 ABY.

It was used to transport troops into enemy territory and was equipped with paralysis canisters which could be dropped over a major population area from an altitude of 3,000 meters. They could cover an area of nearly 9 square kilometers.
The vehicle's maximum atmospheric speed of 750 kilometers per hour and was armed with 6 light ion cannons and 2 laser cannons.
The D'kee-class planetary lander carried a complement of ten P'w'eck "collector barges" which would be deployed after the target area was bombed with paralysis gas.
The ship contained confinement pens which were used to house up to 10,000 prisoners.
